title: Control Component hlVCC Share Payload
description: A control component's hashed long Vote Cast Return Code share.

encryptionGroup.description: The encryption group of the election event.

nodeId.description: The node identifying the control component. Corresponds to the CCR's index j in the specification.

hashLongVoteCastReturnCodeShare.description: A base64 string of size 44 representing the hashed long Vote Cast Return Code share. Corresponds to hlVCC_j_id in the specification.

confirmationKey.description: The confirmation key and context ids.
